Adjusted average retail electricity price is

this group. Circular 67 guiding the
insurance business law has just been issued by the Ministry of Finance.
issued to improve the insurance consulting process
of individual agents and organizations, according to
which the ministry prohibits banks from selling
investment-linked insurance 60 days before and after the award
to limit the situation of forcing customers
to buy insurance with  The
new circular stipulates that banks are
not allowed to advise, introduce, sell or
arrange to sign investment-linked insurance contracts
for customers within
60 days before and after the date of disbursement of the
entire deposit.  This
applies to types of investment-linked insurance,
including universal life insurance and
unit-linked insurance, and other types of insurance
such as space insurance,
explosion insurance, death insurance, mixed insurance that are
not included in the set.  The Ministry of Finance mentioned in
this letter the new regulations issued by the Ministry of Finance
after a series of complaints from
people saying that many borrowers have been forced to buy life insurance
when borrowing during the past time.
Life insurance is like an underground boil even though the
State Bank and the Ministry of Finance both have
written reminders to credit institutions

-year-old man was driving a motorbike in the direction of

died on the spot. Binh Thanh district police and

after causing a hit-and-run accident yesterday.
Bao Loc city police, Lam Dong province,
summoned driver Nguyen Huu.  The 45-year-old lover
lives in Bao Loc city to investigate
violations of traffic control regulations.
Images extracted from cameras
show V at 14:52 on November 8, a truck
with license plate number 49c 21489 circulating on the road.
Highway 20 in the direction from Ho
Chi Minh City to Da Lat When arriving at Thanh

encroached on the motorbike lane to
pass another truck moving in the same

and Mr. Hai was seriously injured and was transferred

driver drove the vehicle away

the same night that Bao City police
Loc coordinated with the traffic police
of La Dong province to identify Mr. Nguyen Hu
Tinh, 45 years old, residing in Bao Loc city, as the

will contribute to reducing 214,000 tons of CO2 per
year. Fishing for corrugated iron on horseback is a
traditional activity of fishermen in the
western coastal region.  Belgium However,
climate change has changed the ecosystem in
the North Sea and is affecting
this fishing activity. People riding horses in shallow waters,
horses dragging chains on the sand, causing
shrimp to jump into the nets.  Osun kake in
western Belgium is the only place in the
world where shrimp fishing is still done on horse jars.
This activity has existed here for hundreds
of years and has been recognized by Unesco as a
world cultural heritage. However, in
recent years  People here have witnessed a
decrease in production and disruptions
in the traditional fishing season.
Previously, the best time to catch bowls was from
September to December when the sea water
started to cool, now you have to wait.  By the end of
the season, with the
current alarming climate change, many species
will not be able to withstand it, they will migrate
or become extinct, thereby affecting the
food web and ecosystem according to the Aeronautics and
Space Administration.  The US Nasa Ocean
has absorbed 90% of the heat from
human-caused climate change
in the past few decades. In the
North Sea, surface temperatures have increased about 0.3 degrees
Celsius each decade since 2015.
